turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a tall black and white mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a tall black and white mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream to be picked up at starbucks in westlake shopping center, daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you shortly.
